content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max Müller, Germany. 

Let's start with a high price to see if you'll accept it. I want 1000 euros for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly higher than what I expect to pay for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Understood, let's try a lower price. I want 800 euros for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While this price is still higher than what I'd prefer, I'm willing to consider it if no lower offers come along. I agree to the price of 800 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
